headline: BUEHLER LOW SPEED CUT-OFF SAW
description: Precision Sectioning Saw     Representative photo - color of saw may vary  Various ISOMET chucks available.   See other information for more details.
keywords: diamond saw abrasive saw low speed saw
specstable:
Manufacturer Buehler
Model ISOMET
Blade Type Diamond
Spindle Type Oil Bearings
Minimum Spindle Speed Min 9 RPM
Maximum Spindle Speed Max 300 RPM
Motor Horsepower 1/50 HP
Specimen Holder/Vice Saddle Chuck Model 11-1187
Accessories

Unit includes:
25, 50, 75, 150 gram weights (one of each)

Other Information

Blade Diameter: 3 to 5 inch
Blade not included

Saw is supplied with a single saddle chuck 11-1187. (See item E on second photo)

Various optional chucks available. Inquire for availability.

See additional photo for images of the following chucks.
Item A - Wafer chuck
Item B - Mount chuck 11-1189
Item C- Bar and tube chuck
Item E - Single saddle chuck 11-1187
Item F - Irregular specimen chuck.

Power Requirements 115 V 1.5 A 60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 10.500 in (26.7 cm)
Depth 10.500 in (26.7 cm)
Height 6.000 in (15.2 cm)
Weight 25 lb (11 kg)
